Main Event: Vadim Nemkov (16-2-0) vs. Yoel Romero (15-6-0) Co-Main Event: Sergio Pettis (22-5-0) vs. Patricio Pitbull (35-5-0) Main Card: Corey Anderson (16-6-0) vs. Phil Davis (24-6-0) Main Card: Daniel James (15-6-1) vs. Gokhan Saricam (8-2-0) Prelim: Wladmir Gouvea (1-0-0) vs. Gabriel Sayeg (1-1-0) Prelim: Kyle Crutchmer (9-2-0) vs. Bobby Nash (12-4-0) Prelim: Pieter Buist (17-6-0) vs. Gadzhi Rabadanov (19-4-2) Prelim: Jaleel Willis (16-4-0) vs. Ramazan Kuramagomedov (10-0-0) Prelim: Mike Hamel (10-5-0) vs. Shamil Nikaev (10-0-0) Prelim: Norbert Novenyi Jr. (6-0-0) vs. Kamil Oniszczuk (9-2-0) Prelim: Archie Colgan (7-0-0) vs. Emmanuel Sanchez (20-8-0) Prelim: Karl Moore (11-2-0) vs. Alex Polizzi (10-2-0) Prelim: Timur Khizriev (12-0-0) vs. Richie Smullen (10-2-1) Prelim: Jordan Newman (5-0-0) vs. Matthew Perry (5-3-0) Prelim: Cody Law (6-2-0) vs. Edwin Chavez (6-4-0)
